ReservationsPage.title: My Reservations
ReservationsPage.noReservationsFoundDescription: Why not book your next visit? It only takes a minute!

ReservationForm.title: Make a Reservation
ReservationForm.description: Fill in the details below to book your table.

success.reservationCreated: Your reservation has been successfully created!

errors.reservationDateInPast: Reservation date cannot be in the past.
errors.reservationTimeInvalid: Please enter a valid time in HH:MM format.
errors.reservationTimeNotInFuture: Reservation date and time must be in the future.
errors.partySizeInvalid: Party size must be at least 1.
errors.partySizeTooLarge: Party size cannot exceed 20 guests for online booking.
errors.userNotAuthenticated: You must be logged in to make a reservation.
errors.databaseError: Could not save reservation due to a database error. Please try again.
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.table_id_invalid: The selected table is not valid. Please choose another table.
errors.noTablesAvailable: No tables are currently available for selection.
errors.tableCapacityExceeded: The selected table cannot accommodate the specified number of guests.
errors.tableUnavailableForGuests: No tables available for a party of {count}. Please try a different party size or contact us.
errors.partySizeExceedsTableCapacity: Party size is too large for the selected table.
errors.tableAlreadyBookedAtTime: This table is already booked for the selected date and time. Please choose a different table or time.

ReservationForm.tableNoTablesAvailable: No tables available for the selected criteria or at all.
ReservationForm.selectPartySizeToFilterTables: Select party size to see suitable tables.
